sn56.20:1: "Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri?
sn56.20:2: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe … ‘Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yogo karaṇīyo"ti.
sn56.20:3: Dhammacakkaṁ tathāgataṁ,khandhā āyatanena ca;Dhāraṇā ca dve avijjā,vijjā saṅkāsanā tathāti.
